target_roles.title: software developer
target_roles.description: Software developers implement or program all kinds of software systems based on specifications and designs by using programming languages, tools, and platforms.
target_roles.essential_skills:
Project management
Use software libraries
Manage engineering project
Create flowchart diagram
Debug software
Analyse software specifications
Interpret technical requirements
Develop software prototype
Provide technical documentation
Use technical drawing software
Define technical requirements
Identify customer requirements
Use software design patterns
Ict debugging tools
Utilise computer-aided software engineering tools
Computer programming
Technical drawings
Perform scientific research
Tools for software configuration management
Engineering processes
Engineering principles
Integrated development environment software
Develop automated migration methods
